reviewText: Wonderful series! I was happy to have the original movies included in the box! This version is the one to get for fans!
Great movies with Kevin sorbo and Michael hurst
Was a purchased for a friend, they were very happy.

Long ago... In a time of myth and legend, when ancient gods plagued man with suffering--only one man dared to challenge their power. Hercules! This spectacular collection brings together all five full-length action-packed movies starring Kevin Sorbo as Hercules and Anthony Quinn as Zeus and includes the entire debut season in one epic collector's set. Kevin Sorbo's fresh, hip and good-natured spin on the legendary hero carried this witty, adventure-filled action drama to high critical acclaim. Smartly combining ancient myth with contemporary sensibilities, the series became one of television's highest rated programs. This 9 Disc Set contains 8 DVDs with All Five Action-Packed Hercules Movies And All 13 Season One Episodes, as well as a special CD-ROM with added bonus material.

This collection contains the entire first season of the cult favorite television series HERCULES - THE LEGENDARY JOURNEYS. A hit when it aired, the series was preceded by five television movies, also included in this set. The show stars Kevin Sorbo as Hercules, the son of Zeus and a mortal woman, Alcmene. Given to tempestuous fits of anger, Hercules decides to control his rage once and for all by using his supernatural abilities for the good of man. Along with his friend Iolaus, Hercules roams the Earth to fight mythological monsters and help humanity.

The AUTHENTIC ANCHOR BAY RELEASE of HERCULES SEASON ONE...with Exclusive Bonus Material.

DVD Set Contains: All Five Action PAcked Hercules Movies and ALL 13 Season One Episodes.

Also the Featurette: The Men Behind the Myth!
